_doc: Mechanical knowledge about talent clusters, hero tree interactions, and build archetypes. Curated from analysis, not auto-generated. Used by skills and archetypes.js.

specClusters.name: Fire/Brand
specClusters.coreLoop: Brand target → align fire damage during debuff window → extend via Charred Flesh
keyMechanics: Fiery Demise: +30% fire damage to branded target
Charred Flesh: IA ticks extend Brand duration
Down in Flames: 2 Brand charges, shorter CD

specClusters.name: Immolation Aura
specClusters.coreLoop: IA ticks generate fragments (Fallout) → scale with target count → fuel spenders
keyMechanics: Fallout: IA ticks have chance to shatter Lesser Soul Fragments
A Fire Inside: extra IA charges for more uptime
Ragefire: IA empowerment from consuming fragments

specClusters.name: Sigil
specClusters.coreLoop: Place sigils for damage + fragment generation (Soul Sigils) → Quickened reduces delay
keyMechanics: Soul Sigils: sigil activation generates Soul Fragments
Quickened Sigils: reduced placement delay + shorter CD
Concentrated Sigils: larger radius, reduced duration

specClusters.name: Frailty Amplification
specClusters.coreLoop: Spirit Bomb applies Frailty → Vulnerability/Soulcrush extend and amplify → damage taken debuff
keyMechanics: Spirit Bomb: applies Frailty (damage taken increase) per fragment consumed
Soulcrush: Fracture applies Frailty stacks directly
Vulnerability: increased Frailty effectiveness

specClusters.name: Fragment Engine
specClusters.coreLoop: Fracture generates fragments → pool to 5 → Spirit Bomb consumes → Soul Furnace amplifies at 8+ stacks
keyMechanics: Fracture: primary fragment generator (2 per cast, 3 in Meta)
Soul Furnace: amplifies Spirit Bomb at 8+ stacks consumed
Untethered Rage: ~3.75% proc chance per SBomb (souls_consumed * 0.0075 * pow(1.35, seething_anger_up)) — nerfed from ~50%

specClusters.name: Cooldown/Fel Devastation
specClusters.coreLoop: Fel Devastation as burst CD → Darkglare Boon for Fury refund → Stoke the Flames reduces CD
keyMechanics: Fel Devastation: channeled Fire AoE, heals, generates Fury
Darkglare Boon: chance to refund Fury on Fel Dev hit
Stoke the Flames: reduces Fel Dev CD

specClusters.name: Physical Single-Target
specClusters.coreLoop: Fracture → Soul Cleave as primary Physical spender → Focused Cleave amplifies SC damage
keyMechanics: Focused Cleave: +50% Soul Cleave damage
Soul Cleave: primary Fury spender, Physical damage
Fracture: replaces Shear, generates 2 fragments

aldrachi_reaver.coreLoop: Reaver's Glaive → enhanced Fracture → enhanced Soul Cleave → Art of the Glaive cycle → Thrill of the Fight
keyMechanics: Reaver's Mark: 7% damage amp debuff (20s, stacks to 3 via Bladecraft)
Keen Edge: +10% all Physical damage
Thrill of the Fight: +6% Haste + 30% RG damage after cycle completion
Fury of the Aldrachi: enhanced Soul Cleave → 3-12 Physical glaive slashes
Wounded Quarry: Physical damage echoes 20% as Chaos to marked target
Broken Spirit: Sigil of Spite shatters +1 fragment, Soul Cleave 20% chance to shatter

annihilator.coreLoop: Fracture builds Voidfall stacks (35% chance) → at 3, Soul Cleave/SBomb dumps meteors → every 3rd meteor = World Killer (+50% damage, -10s Meta CD)
keyMechanics: Voidfall: 35% proc per Fracture → stack to 3 → spend via Soul Cleave
Meteoric Fall: at 3 stacks, dump all 3 → 3 rapid meteors
World Killer (apex): 3rd meteor = +50% dmg/area, -10s Meta CD
Catastrophe: Shadowflame DoT on meteor-hit targets (25% over 8s)
Dark Matter: first Spirit Bomb in Meta → Meteor Shower DoT (6s)
Mass Acceleration: Meta → instant 3 stacks + Spirit Bomb CD reset
Celestial Echoes: +30% Fracture damage, +5 Fury per Fracture
Otherworldly Focus: +35% SBomb/meteor damage at 1 target (-5% per extra)

optimizationNotes.metaTiming: Allow Meta during Voidfall building phase — Mass Acceleration overwrites building stacks, so building stacks are not 'wasted'
optimizationNotes.felDevGuard: Don't channel FelDev during Voidfall spending — wastes meteor triggers from SC/SBomb
optimizationNotes.missingAbilities: Felblade and ImmAura filler were missing from original Anni branch — adding them gives +4-12% depending on build
optimizationNotes.spiritBombThreshold: Static threshold 5 beats dynamic 3/5 for Anni
optimizationNotes.fractureInMeta: Unlike AR, Fracture-in-Meta priority doesn't help — Voidfall cycle dictates Fracture timing
optimizationNotes.bestArchetype: CF+DiF+SC+FO (all 4 differentiating talents) is optimal at 112k weighted
optimizationNotes.vsAR: Anni dominates AoE (146k 5T vs 103k AR), AR slightly better ST (32.2k vs 32.1k)

clusterSynergies.reason: AR's payload is Physical (Keen Edge, Fury of the Aldrachi glaive slashes). Fiery Demise amplifies Fire damage, which doesn't benefit Physical attacks. Brand windows still valuable for fire-school abilities (Immo Aura, Sigil of Flame, Fel Dev) but AR's core damage loop gains less.
Catastrophe and Voidfall Meteors are Shadowflame school — directly amplified by Fiery Demise. Charred Flesh extends Brand window for more meteor coverage.
IA operates independently of AR cycle. Fallout fragments feed both hero trees equally. No special interaction with Reaver's Glaive or Art of the Glaive.
IA is Fire school, not Shadowflame. No direct interaction with Voidfall or meteor mechanics. Fallout fragments are useful but not specially synergized.
Broken Spirit: Sigil of Spite shatters +1 fragment and Soul Cleave has 20% chance to shatter. Soul Sigils adds fragments from sigil activation, feeding the AR cycle.
No special interaction between sigils and Voidfall/meteor mechanics. Soul Sigils fragments are useful generically but don't accelerate Voidfall stacking.

Reaver's Mark (7% damage taken increase) is multiplicative with Frailty. Double-debuff stacking on target makes all AR Physical damage hit harder. Spirit Bomb → Frailty → Reaver's Mark → amplified SC/Fracture.
Spirit Bomb is a key Voidfall trigger (consumes stacks at 3 → meteors). Frailty debuff amplifies subsequent meteor damage. Spirit Bomb serves dual purpose: Frailty application + meteor trigger.
AR cycle consumes 20 fragments to trigger Reaver's Glaive. Fragment generation rate directly determines cycle frequency. Soul Carver is a burst fragment generator that accelerates the cycle.

Anni uses fragments via Spirit Bomb (meteor trigger) and Soul Cleave (meteor trigger at 3 Voidfall stacks). Fragment count matters for Spirit Bomb value but Voidfall stacking is the primary gating mechanic, not fragments.
Fel Devastation is a strong damage ability that benefits from Fiery Demise (Fire school). No special AR interaction, but fits into Brand burst windows.
Meteoric Strikes and Fel Dev together create burst Fire/Shadowflame windows. Fel Dev during Meta generates fragments rapidly. Darkglare Boon Fury refund helps sustain spender usage during burst.
Keen Edge +10% all Physical damage directly amplifies Soul Cleave, Fracture, and Fury of the Aldrachi glaive slashes. AR's core output is Physical — this cluster IS the AR damage backbone.
Anni's primary damage is Shadowflame (meteors, Catastrophe DoT). Physical Soul Cleave matters as a trigger for Voidfall meteor dump, but its raw damage is secondary to the meteor payload.

buildArchetypes.name: AR Fragment Engine + Frailty
buildArchetypes.coreLoop: Soul Carver → fragments → Spirit Bomb (Frailty) → RM × Frailty double-amp
buildArchetypes.strengths: Multiplicative amp stacking (RM × Frailty), strong ST and cleave
buildArchetypes.tensions: Fragment competition between Soul Cleave (AR cycle) and Spirit Bomb (Frailty)
buildArchetypes.tradeoffs: High fragment demand — must balance AR cycle consumption vs Spirit Bomb pooling

buildArchetypes.name: AR Brand + Frailty Triple-Amp
buildArchetypes.coreLoop: Fiery Brand → Spirit Bomb (Frailty) → RM × Fiery Demise × Frailty triple-amp window
buildArchetypes.strengths: Triple-amp burst windows. RM × Fiery Demise × Frailty creates highest single-target burst
buildArchetypes.tensions: AR Physical payload doesn't benefit from Fiery Demise — only fire-school abilities do
buildArchetypes.tradeoffs: Brand windows are burst-dependent; damage is lumpy not smooth. Point-heavy across two clusters.

buildArchetypes.name: AR Physical + Sigil Fragments
buildArchetypes.coreLoop: Keen Edge amplifies all Physical → Sigils + Broken Spirit for extra fragments → faster AR cycles
buildArchetypes.strengths: Lean into AR's native Physical damage school. Sigils feed fragment generation via Soul Sigils + Broken Spirit
buildArchetypes.tensions: Sigil fragment generation is on a different timescale than Fracture — may cause pooling misalignment
buildArchetypes.tradeoffs: Less burst amplification than Brand builds. Stronger sustained output.

buildArchetypes.name: Anni Meteor + Brand Amplification
buildArchetypes.coreLoop: Fiery Brand → Voidfall meteors (Shadowflame = amplified by Fiery Demise) → Charred Flesh extends window
buildArchetypes.strengths: Meteors are Shadowflame — directly amplified by Fiery Demise. Charred Flesh extends Brand for more meteor coverage
buildArchetypes.tensions: Brand CD (60s) vs Voidfall cycle timing — meteors may not align with Brand windows
buildArchetypes.tradeoffs: Heavy investment in both Brand cluster and hero tree mechanics. Strongest burst combo but requires precise alignment.

buildArchetypes.name: Anni Meta Uptime Maximizer
buildArchetypes.coreLoop: Maximize Meta uptime via World Killer CDR → Mass Acceleration resets SBomb → chain meteor dumps
buildArchetypes.strengths: World Killer CDR chains Meta windows. Mass Acceleration provides instant SBomb reset on Meta cast
buildArchetypes.tensions: Requires tight Voidfall management — must spend stacks before Meta to avoid overcapping from Mass Acceleration
buildArchetypes.tradeoffs: Requires tight cooldown tracking; Spirit Bomb threshold changes during Meta (3 frags per Fracture)

buildArchetypes.name: Anni Spirit Bomb-Centric
buildArchetypes.coreLoop: Fragment generation → Spirit Bomb as primary Voidfall trigger + Frailty applicator → meteor spam
buildArchetypes.strengths: Spirit Bomb serves triple duty: damage, Frailty application, and Voidfall meteor trigger
buildArchetypes.tensions: Spirit Bomb on 25s CD limits meteor trigger frequency. Soul Cleave is the only alternative trigger between SBomb CDs
buildArchetypes.tradeoffs: Less Meta cycling than meta-cycle build. More consistent Frailty uptime.

tensionPoints.description: Fire/Brand is stronger with Anni than AR
tensionPoints.explanation: AR's damage payload is Physical (not amplified by Fiery Demise). Anni's meteors are Shadowflame (directly amplified). The 'fire build' is actually better on the non-fire hero tree.

tensionPoints.description: Soul Cleave and Spirit Bomb compete for fragments
tensionPoints.explanation: AR needs Soul Cleave for the empowered cycle (Fury of the Aldrachi). Spirit Bomb needs 4-5 fragments for Frailty value. Both draw from the same fragment pool, and overconsumption by one starves the other. This tension is structural — no threshold tweak resolves it, only careful arbitration logic.

tensionPoints.description: Mass Acceleration grants 3 Voidfall stacks on Meta — must pre-spend
tensionPoints.explanation: If you enter Meta with 1+ Voidfall stacks, Mass Acceleration's 3 stacks overcap (max is 3). You must dump stacks immediately before Meta. This creates a forced sequencing requirement: Soul Cleave/SBomb → Meta → SBomb (reset from Mass Acceleration).

tensionPoints.description: Spirit Bomb's 25s CD limits Voidfall meteor triggers
tensionPoints.explanation: Spirit Bomb is the highest-value Voidfall trigger (consumes 4-5 fragments + applies Frailty + triggers meteors). But with a 25s CD, you can only trigger it ~2.4x/min. Between SBomb CDs, Soul Cleave is the only alternative trigger, which consumes fewer fragments and doesn't apply Frailty.

tensionPoints.description: Too many priority abilities during Fiery Brand window
tensionPoints.explanation: During a Brand window (~10s with Charred Flesh extensions), you want to cast: Soul Carver, Spirit Bomb, Fel Devastation, Sigil of Spite — all fire/shadowflame school abilities that benefit from Fiery Demise. But with ~7 GCDs available, plus Fracture for fragment generation and the AR/Anni cycle demands, GCD budget saturates. Not everything fits, requiring triage.

tensionPoints.description: SBomb threshold should drop during Fiery Demise windows (AR)
tensionPoints.explanation: Fiery Demise provides +30% fire damage. A 3-fragment SBomb during FD (3 × base × 1.3 = 3.9 × base) is worth casting even though a 5-frag outside FD (5 × base) is nominally stronger per-cast — the throughput gain from more FD-window casts dominates. Confirmed +0.18% weighted, +0.30% AR. Does NOT help Anni (Voidfall cycle manages its own SBomb timing).

tensionPoints.description: GCDs, not fury or fragments, are the binding resource constraint
tensionPoints.explanation: Fury surplus is ~100-200/min (460-510 gen vs 311-381 consumed). Fragment surplus is ~12-24/min (36-44 gen vs 20-24 consumed, 34% overflow). The real constraint is GCDs: 30 GCDs in 30s leaves no room for additional abilities. Priority optimization must focus on which abilities get GCDs, not resource management.
